summary.para: The CERT_ALT_NAME_INFO structure is used in encoding and decoding extensions for subject or issuer certificates, Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs), and Certificate Trust Lists (CTLs).
creates an instance of this structure when performed on a structure's Value member with its structure's pszObjId member set to szOID_SUBJECT_ALT_NAME or szOID_ISSUER_ALT_NAME.
An instance of this structure can be used as input to to create an appropriate .
Number of elements in the rgAltEntry array.
